main event: A brilliant yellow flash with a large trail of heavy black smoke was observed descending in the sky near Big Delta, Alaska.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 to 10 seconds., The trail of smoke was larger than the flash itself., The flash was described as the size of a dime., Two other individuals witnessed the trail of smoke but missed the initial flash., The report concluded it was probably a daylight meteor.
sighted object: brilliant yellow flash with a large trail of heavy black smoke
witness description: Civilian observers, including Mr. Keim and two others.
